title: Double weight pocket, black, right - Tecline

photos.alt: Kieszeń balastowa podwójna, czarna, prawa - Tecline

description:
Product description

DOUBLE WEIGHT POCKET, RIGHT

 

DESCRIPTION:

- Double weight pocket, right , with a buckle

- To be fixed on a backplate with the included screws

- The pocket holds up to  4-5kg of weights (depending on the shape of weights)

- Delivered with an insert which helps to install the weights in place

- Color: black

 

NOTE!

THE POCKET IS DELIVERED WITH A SHORT SCREW:

Please use the included short screw to install the pocket to the backplate. If you need to install the pocket and, another piece of accessory (e.g. backplate softpad) please use a long screw (T01103), to be purchased separately.
